casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher B. SMITH 119P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 19, 2018 Mr. Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, For Smith, Christopher B. Ms. Tiffany Y. Lucas, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina Ms. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of April 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of April 2018."
